Cause:

Zip file contains 2 logs 
access_log1.log with 30 records 
access_log2.log with 10 records.

After import zip file is haivng 39 records in "Log View", whereas there should be 40 records altogether.
Testcase fails because of records mismatch.

TPTP build id: tptp.sdk-TPTP-4.4.0-200705080100A
This is nice to have from AC perspective.

Here it seems like a single event goes missing, i dont see a clear reason why this should happen.

Vrushali,
Did you try this test manually? Did you verify that one event disappeared even when done manually?

traces.message: The number of records is not what was expected.Expected number of records: 40
